title: Emerald Cascade Jhumkas: A Timeless Telugu Bridal Treasure
materials: Finely crafted in 22K Gold with a Hyderabadi polish to enhance its luster. The Jhumkas feature a vibrant emerald cabochon centerpiece
meticulously set cubic zirconia stones for unparalleled brilliance.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas showcase a delicate floral top design followed by the intricate pattern, leading to a spherical, cage-like Jhumka. The design allows the light to refract through the zirconia, creating a captivating sparkle. The base of the Jhumka is adorned with tiny pearl drops, adding a touch of elegance and movement.
colors: Classic combination of radiant gold and the rich green of the emerald
further highlighted by the dazzling white of the cubic zirconia. A truly regal palette.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి)
and festivals (పండుగలు). Also makes a statement piece for modern events and parties.
description: These Jhumkas are more than just jewelry; they are an heirloom-worthy investment. Their traditional design, combined with modern elements like the dazzling zirconia, makes them incredibly versatile. The high-quality gold and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability. Embrace the charm of Hyderabad's jewelry heritage with this breathtaking piece.
